The Nemox Gelato 5K is a state of the art gelato, semi-soft ice cream, and granita batch freezer. Its functions include manual operation, four automated production programs, and four storage programs tailored for the different needs and characteristics of the products it makes. These automated programs take care of the whole creation process so you can feel free to focus on other tasks while you wait!

      • Manual and automatic functions

entry.summary:

The Hamilton Beach Commercial "Mix 'n Chill" model 94950 is a drink mixer perfect for heavy-duty mixing. It comes with variable speed control for maximum versatility, and its powerful 3/4 horsepower motor will be able to handle thicker blends and mix-ins.

This model is similar to the Hamilton Beach HMD900, but without pre-programmed cycles or one-hand activation.

      • Heavy duty motor for hard ice cream and tough mix-ins

entry.title: Waring Commercial WDM360TX - Triple Spindle Drink Mixer with Three Speeds & Timer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Milkshake Machine
Price: 1798.00

The Waring Commercial WDM360TX is a heavy-duty, triple-spindle drink mixer with a high-performance 1-horsepower motor for durability. It will allow you to quickly mix the coldest, hardest ice creams. It has a three speed motor with a pulse switch and includes three stainless steel malt beverage cups.

This model has a fully automatic START/STOP operation, which means after you slide the cup into the mixer, it will operate without you needing to stand there. But with the programmable timer, you're really going to be able to ensure precise mixing results. The timer will help you improve your time management, and it comes with a large, easy to read LCD display and gives you the ability to program the timer either while it's in use, or before it's in use. 

This milkshake mixer has a rocker switch, for 15,000, 18,000, or 21,000 RPM speed capabilities. One other great feature is that there is an increased cup clearance, which means you're not going to have to tilt your cup into the mixer and risk spilling your product. Instead, you'll be able to easily slide your cup right into the mixer.

      • Pulse switch will run motor at selected speed to fine-tune your mix
      • Increased cup clearance: slide cups into position without tilt – don’t lose any ingredients before or after mixing
      • Heavy-duty die-cast housing – easy to clean and impressive footprint
      • Brand new ultra-aggressive agitator powers through the hardest ice creams
      • Also includes butterfly agitator for softer ice creams and use with many types of cups
      • Stainless steel malt beverage cup included
      • Motors incorporate thermal protection and are easily user-replaceable

VIDEO

SPECS

Model WDM360TX
Dimensions (WDH) 15.1" x 13" x 22"
Weight 38.5 lb
Electrical 120v / 60 hz / 2.2a, NEMA 5-15P 
Listings NSF approved

WARRANTY

One year limited warranty.

﻿DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Gel Matic MV EASY 2 KOLOR - Twin Twist Ripple Soft Serve Machine - 52 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 38893.00

The Gel Matic "MV EASY 2 KOLOR" ripple soft serve machine is designed to create attractive express gelato, frozen yogurt, and ripple soft serve. It's a twin flavour machine with a special dispenser that can add three different ripple flavours.

It can produce up to 50 kilograms per hour, which is about 665 servings per hour (75 gram servings). In imperial units, that'd be about 440 servings per hour (in 4 ounce servings).

It comes with Gel Matic's simple and intuitive "E.Co.S." touch screen controls. A stainless steel cabinet holds the three syrup containers. A pressure control lets you easily adjust the amount of syrup usedIf you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

      • State of the art machine 
      • Two flavours, and three different ripple flavours
      • Air cooled
      • Pump fed
      • Floor Model
      • 50 kilogram output per hour (around 52 liters per hour)
      • Hopper capacity: 17 litre
      • Cylinder capacity: two 2.6 litre

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS

FEATURES

Variegated Ice Cream

Add three different ripple flavours/colours, to create an attractive feature with diversification. 

Pump Fed

The pump has an AISI 304 stainless steel body with just a few parts for easy removal and cleaning, as well as peak polymer gears for a longer life.


Easy positioning

Upwards air flow allows you to place the unit right up against the wall.


Stainless steel cabinet

Contains the syrup injection system, using compressed air, making it easy to adjust the amount used. 

SPECS

Models MV EASY 2 KOLOR
Type Floor Model
Cooling Air
Flavours 2 + 3 variegates
Hoppers 2
Cylinder Capacity Two 2.6 litre
Hopper Capacity 17 liters
Power 3 Ph, 208-230v, 60 Hz
Remote Control No
Dimensions (WDH) 23.6" x 32.2" x 60.6"
Weight 650 lb

OUTPUT CAPACITY

*The output capacity for this machine is officially rated at 70 kilograms per hour, or 230 servings per hour (with 75 gram portions). For comparison, this is roughly 152 servings per hour (at 4 ounce portions), and around 18 liters of soft serve per hour.

WARRANTY

1 year parts, 5 year compressor, 90 days labour.

entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 46781.00

The GelMatic Etoile Gel Plus PM is an air cooled, floor-model soft serve ice cream machine with three flavours and two twist options. It has an output capacity of 70 kilograms an hour (which is around 72 liters of soft serve). This is a state of the art machine which can produce express gelato, frozen yogurt, and soft serve ice cream. It can make up to 930 servings an hour (at 75 gram portions), which is in imperial units, 615 servings (4 ounce servings).

The easy-to-use, interactive "In.Co.Di.S." control system has a crisp, 7" touchscreen, which lets you program, monitor, and trouble-shoot every function on the machine -- you can even do this remotely. It's a very user friendly machine, thanks to its simple and intuitive interface, and the modular menus let you personalize every parameter.

All in all, this is a top quality machine from a top quality brand. This thing will be working for you consistently for many years to come. If you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

entry.title: Gel Matic SC 250 GR - Twin Twist Soft Serve Machine - 28 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 18341.00

The GelMatic "SC 250 GR" is an air cooled, gravity-fed, countertop soft serve ice cream machine with two flavours and a twist. It has an output capacity of 27 kilograms an hour (which is around 28 litres of soft serve). This can make around 360 servings per hour (at 75 grams portions), or in the imperial system, around 238 servings per hour (at 4 ounce serving).

This machine was designed and created entirely in Italy, with the latest in technology and ingenuity. It has a vintage, stylish look, making this a perfect soft serve machine for bars, cafés, pastry shops, kiosks, ice cream shops, and restaurants.

It features an advanced and easy-to-use 4.3" touchscreen, Gel Matic's  "In.Co.Di.S" system. This stands for "Interactive Control & Diagnosis System." It lets you program, monitor, and troubleshoot every function of the machine with a user-friendly interface. If you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

      • State of the art machine
      • Two flavours with twist
      • Air cooled
      • Gravity Fed
      • Retro,stylish design
      • Countertop model
      • 27 kilogram output per hour (around 28 liters per hour)
      • Two 1.2 litre freezing cylinders
      • Two 6.5 litre mix hoppers

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS

GRAVITY FEED


The gravity fed production system has a metering valve that allows the mixture and the air to pass into the freezing cylinder, using the power of gravity.

entry.summary:
Vendor: SaniServ
Type: Shake Freezer
Price: 11393.00

The SaniServ 601 is a high volume shake freezer that can produce up to three 12 ounce shakes per minute. With its efficient design and fast recovery time, this is a money making machine that is easy to operate and will churn out consistent products every time, even during your busiest rush-hours. 

It has SaniServ's "Accufreeze" sold state controls, which are going to give you sophisticated controls which will produce great products with a care-free operation. This machine has a small footprint, but a big output. It is a machine that can have a huge return on investment.

This machine has been built in America, with the highest quality parts and design. SaniServe is a brand that is trusted by big fast food chains like WhiteCastle, all the way to major hospitals. So you know you're going to be getting a great product at a great price.

      • Made in the USA
      • NSF approved

entry.summary:
Vendor: SaniServ
Type: Batch Freezer
Price: 31744.00

The SaniServ B10 is a floor model, 10 quart batch freezer for a single flavour of ice cream or gelato. This machine will help you make a consistent and high-quality product, without a fuss. It's an incredibly simple machine to operate, and keeping the machine clean is very easy (it is NSF certified). You're also able to add mix-ins after production, so you're able to make almost any flavour you want.

The B5 has been made in the USA. This means it's been made with an attention to detail and top quality craftsmanship and parts. It has a stainless steel exterior and durable steel interior frame -- this heavy duty construction means this batch freezer is a workhorse and will be working for your consistently for many years to come.

SaniServ is a brand that is trusted all over America, with major restaurant chains like White Castle and big hospitals. So with the B10 you can know that you're making an investment into your company with a top-notch product from a top-notch brand.

entry.title: Gel Matic SC EASY 1 GR - Single Flavour Soft Serve Machine - 15 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 9353.00

The GelMatic "SC EASY 1 GR" is an air cooled, countertop soft serve ice cream machine with a single flavour. It has an output capacity of 15 kilograms an hour (which is around 15.6 liters of soft serve). This is a state of the art machine which can produce express gelato, frozen yogurt, and (of course) soft serve ice cream. It has an extremely slim design, which is great for smaller establishments who are tight on space, and it has a vintage, elegant design that is perfect for for bars, cafés, pastry shops, kiosks, and restaurants.

It features the "E.CO.S," which is a control system with a multi-language LCD touchscreen, colour display and 5 capacitive keys for maximum reliability and impermeability. It five you straight-forward and total control of the machine, thanks to its intuitive symbols for adjusting the parameters such as the creaminess, the temperature, and the functioning of the mixer.

GelMatic uses only Lafert motors, which are 100% made in Italy, to guarantee high performance, even under extreme conditions. Reliability and energy savings go hand-in-hand thanks to the great efficiency of these motors.

The heat exchangers are precisely sized to ensure optimal efficiency, and the parts are welded together to guarantee that there is never any leakage.

All in all, this is a top quality machine from a top quality brand. This thing will be working for you consistently for many years to come. 

      • State of the art machine
      • Single flavour
      • Air cooled
      • Gravity Fed
      • Retro, slim design
      • Countertop model
      • 15 kilogram output per hour (around 15.6 liters per hour)
      • 1.2 litre freezing cylinder
      • 6.5 litre mix hopper

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS

entry.title: Gel Matic BV 250 GR - Twin Twist Soft Serve Machine - 34 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 24258.00 - 30087.00 (2 variants)

The GelMatic BV 250 GR is an air cooled, floor-model soft serve ice cream machine with twin twist (that is, two flavours, plus a twist option!). It has an output capacity of 33 kilograms an hour (which is around 34 liters of soft serve). This is a state of the art machine which can produce express gelato, frozen yogurt, and (of course) soft serve ice cream.

The easy-to-use, interactive "In.Co.Di.S." control system has a crisp, 7" touchscreen, which lets you program, monitor, and trouble-shoot every function on the machine -- you can even do this remotely. It's a very user friendly machine, thanks to its simple and intuitive interface, and the modular menus let you personalize every parameter.

GelMatic uses only Lafert motors, which are 100% made in Italy, to guarantee high performance, even under extreme conditions. Reliability and energy savings go hand-in-hand thanks to the great efficiency of these motors: the beater motors and the power units all meet IE3 standards of energy efficiency. The mechanical drive consists of a worm screw, which was designed in-house to meet the specific needs of express freezing units -- this is going to guarantee silent operation and minimum upkeep.

The heat exchangers are precisely sized to ensure optimal efficiency and the parts are welded together to guarantee that there is never any leakage. Only the very best components are used, as Gel Matic sources these from world leaders such as Bristol, Dorin, Embraco, Danfoss, and Rivacold to guarantee top notch performance in terms of heat and noise.

All in all, this is a top quality machine from a top quality brand. This thing will be working for you consistently for many years to come. If you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

      • State of the art machine -- can be remote controlled from your smart phone, tablet, or computer
      • "Twin twist" (two flavours, plus twist)
      • Air cooled
      • Gravity Fed
      • Able to be controlled remotely
      • Floor model
      • 33 kilogram output per hour (around 34 liters per hour)
      • 1.7 litre freezing cylinder (x2)
      • 11.0 litre mix hopper (x2)

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS

REMOTE CONTROL

OPTIONS


Gravity Fed

The gravity fed production system has a metering valve that allows the mixture and the air to pass into the freezing cylinder, using the power of gravity.


Pump Fed

The pump has an AISI 304 stainless steel body with just a few parts for easy removal and cleaning, as well as peak polymer gears for a longer life.

The heat exchangers are precisely sized to ensure optimal efficiency and the parts are welded together to guarantee that there is never any leakage. Only the very best components are used, as Gel Matic sources these from world leaders such as Bristol, Dorin, Embraco, Danfoss, and Rivacold to guarantee top notch performance in terms of heat and noise.

All in all, this is a top quality machine from a top quality brand. This thing will be working for you consistently for many years to come. If you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

      • State of the art machine -- can be remote controlled from your smart phone, tablet, or computer
      • "Twin twist" (two flavours, plus twist)
      • Air cooled
      • Gravity Fed
      • Able to be controlled remotely
      • Countertop model
      • 26 kilogram output per hour (around 27 liters per hour)
      • 1.7 litre freezing cylinder (x2)
      • 11.0 litre mix hopper (x2)

TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS

REMOTE CONTROL

GRAVITY FEED

The gravity fed production system has a metering valve that allows the mixture and the air to pass into the freezing cylinder, using the power of gravity.

entry.title: Gel Matic BC 150 GR - Single Flavour Soft Serve Machine - 18 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: GelMatic
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 15421.00 - 18713.00 (2 variants)

The GelMatic BC 150 GR is an air cooled, countertop soft serve ice cream machine with a single flavour. It has an output capacity of 17 kilograms an hour (which is around 18 liters of soft serve). This is a state of the art machine which can produce express gelato, frozen yogurt, and (of course) soft serve ice cream.

The easy-to-use, interactive "In.Co.Di.S." control system has a crisp, 7" touchscreen, which lets you program, monitor, and trouble-shoot every function on the machine -- you can even do this remotely. It's a very user friendly machine, thanks to its simple and intuitive interface, and the modular menus let you personalize every parameter.

GelMatic uses only Lafert motors, which are 100% made in Italy, to guarantee high performance, even under extreme conditions. Reliability and energy savings go hand-in-hand thanks to the great efficiency of these motors: the beater motors and the power units all meet IE3 standards of energy efficiency. The mechanical drive consists of a worm screw, which was designed in-house to meet the specific needs of express freezing units -- this is going to guarantee silent operation and minimum upkeep.

The heat exchangers are precisely sized to ensure optimal efficiency and the parts are welded together to guarantee that there is never any leakage. Only the very best components are used, as Gel Matic sources these from world leaders such as Bristol, Dorin, Embraco, Danfoss, and Rivacold to guarantee top notch performance in terms of heat and noise.

All in all, this is a top quality machine from a top quality brand. This thing will be working for you consistently for many years to come. If you're looking for more information on this machine and the Gel Matic brand, check out their brochure.

      • State of the art machine -- can be remote controlled from your smart phone, tablet, or computer
      • Single flavour
      • Air cooled
      • Gravity Fed or pump fed

      • 1.7 litre freezing cylinder
      • 11.0 litre mix hopper

REMOTE CONTROLS

The gravity fed production system has a metering valve that allows the mixture and the air to pass into the freezing cylinder, using the power of gravity.

Pump Fed

The pump has an AISI 304 stainless steel body with just a few parts for easy removal and cleaning, as well as peak polymer gears for a longer life.

entry.title: Waring Commercial WCIC20 - 2 Qt. Ice Cream Maker - 120v
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Batch Freezer
Price: 985.00

The Waring Commercial WCIC20 ice cream maker can produce up to 2 quarts of ice cream, frozen yogurt, or gelato in just 30 minutes (which is roughly about 1.9 litres in 30 minutes, or 3.8 litres per hour). So this is a perfect little machine for a business that wants to try out gelato or ice cream, without breaking the bank

The WCIC20 has a compressor built into it, so you're not going to have to pre-freeze your ingredients beforehand, which drastically reduces the hassle and prep-time to make batches of ice cream.

Its high quality mixing paddle will incorporate just the right amount of air into the product, so its consistency will be just right every single time. And if that wasn't good enough, the aluminum batch bowl is removable, so that makes cleanup super simple!

      • Makes up to 2 quarts (1.9 litres) of ice cream, frozen yogurt or gelato in about 30 minutes
      • No pre-freezing is required, because it has a built-in compressor
      • Easy-to-clean, stainless steel exterior and touch controls
      • "Keep Cool" feature holds ice cream at the optimal temperature when processing is finished
      • Removable, see-through batch bowl and “mix-in” lid allows you to view ice cream as it mixes.

SPECS

Model WCIC20
Made in USA
Dimensions (WHD) 16.7" x 11.18" x 10.3"

entry.title: Spaceman 6378 - Twin Twist Soft Serve Machine - 57 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spaceman
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 23684.00 - 25482.00 (4 variants)

The Spaceman 6378 is a floor-model twin twist soft serve machine. It is a high capacity machine that can produce up to 57 litres of soft-serve ice cream an hour (which is roughly 360 servings of four ounces). This machine is capable of doing more than just soft serve: you can do ice cream, frozen yoghurt, custards or sorbets in this machine just fine, and by having two twist options, you have added variety.

This machine has a number of great features: independent digital controls, refrigerated hoppers, a standby mode, a low mix indicator light, and more. It also comes with a hopper agitator, which is really going to make operating this machine a whole lot easier: your staff won't have to continually mix the product throughout the day.

The 6378-C is gravity-fed, but you have the option of getting a pressurized air pump instead with the model 6378A-C. This option is a little bit more costly, but it allows you to choose between six overrun settings, giving you the ability to add even more air to your product, yielding higher profits, creamier, fluffier, and lighter product.

      • Two flavours + twist
      • Gravity feed or air pump option
      • Floor model
      • Digital controls
      • Hopper agitator included
      • 57 litre output per hour (360 servings per hour)
      • Two 3.2 litres freezing cylinders
      • Two 15 litre mix hoppers

SPECS

Flavours Two + Twist
Cooling Air Cooled
Freezing Cylinders 2 x 3.2 litre
Product Mix Hoppers 2 x 15.0 litre

entry.title: Spaceman 6236 - Single Flavour Soft Serve Machine - 37 Litre Output
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spaceman
Type: Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine
Price: 13689.00 - 14437.00 (2 variants)

Spaceman's 6236-C and 6236A-C are gravity-fed and pressurized air pump, high capacity, single flavour soft serve machines. They are countertop models with an output of up to 37 litres per hour (or 320 four-ounce servings per hour). This soft serve machine is great for much more than ice cream: it can do frozen yoghurt, custards, or even sorbet. 

The digital control system will automatically regulate and maintain your product's quality, and a refrigerated hopper and "Standby Mode" will keep your product fresh, even overnight.

      • Single flavour
      • Gravity feed or air pump
      • Countertop model
      • Digital controls
      • Hopper agitator included
      • 37 litre output per hour (320 servings per hour)
      • 3.2 litre freezing cylinder
      • 12 litre mix hopper

OPTIONAL AIR PUMP

The optional air pump adds air to the product prior to freezing to make product lighter and less dense. It allows you to choose between six overrun settings, giving you the ability to add even more air to the product, yielding higher profits, creamier, fluffier, and lighter product.

This can save you money because you'll be using less product. And it's highly recommended for customers serving cones and high-quality ice cream products who want an extra-creamy consistency.

entry.title: Waring Commercial WDM120TX - Single Spindle Drink Mixer with Three Speeds & Timer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waring
Type: Milkshake Machine
Price: 730.00

The Waring Commercial WDM120TX is a heavy duty single spindle drink mixer with a high-performance 1 HP motor for durability and quickly mixing the coldest, hardest ice creams. It has a three speed motor with a pulse switch and includes a stainless steel malt beverage cup.

This model has fully automatic, cup activated START/STOP operation, which means after you slide the cup into the mixer, it will operate without you needing to stand there. But with the programmable timer, you're going to be able to ensure precise mixing results. The timer will help you improve your time management, and it comes with a large, easy to read LCD display and gives you the ability to program the timer either while it's in use, or before it's in use.

This drink mixer has 15,000, 18,000, or 21,000 RPM speed capabilities. One other great feature is that there is an increased cup clearance, which means you're not going to have to tilt your cup into the mixer and risk spilling your product. Instead, you'll be able to easily slide your cup right into the mixer.

      • Pulse switch will run motor at selected speed to fine-tune your mix
      • Increased cup clearance: slide cups into position without tilt – don’t lose any ingredients before or after mixing
      • Heavy-duty die-cast housing – easy to clean and impressive footprint
      • Brand new ultra-aggressive agitator powers through the hardest ice creams
      • Also includes butterfly agitator for softer ice creams and use with many types of cups
      • Stainless steel malt beverage cup included
      • Motors incorporate thermal protection and are easily user-replaceable

VIDEO

SPECS

Model WDM120TX
Dimensions (WDH) 9.05" x 10.23" x 22"
Weight 18.48 lb
Electrical 120v / 60 hz / 1.15a, NEMA 5-15P 
Listings NSF approved

      WARRANTY

      One year limited warranty.
